tdTreemap
directive in module tide-angular

Description

Generates a Treemap with the total population distributed in "rectangles" acording to the size of each record records are grouped in Columns (Ex. "Type of school") and Colors (Ex "zone") ... allowing to visualize the distribution of the population according to 2 main categories and within each unit of analisis (Ex School)

Dependencies

  • $compile
  • _
  • d3
  • tideLayoutTreemap
  • toolTip

Usage

as attribute
<div td-treemap
     td-data="{array}"
     td-xattribute="{string}"
     td-id-attribute="{string}"
     td-size-attribute="{string}"
     td-color-attribute="{string}"
     [td-tooltip-message="{function}"]
     [td-width="{int}"]
     [td-height="{int}"]
     [td-color-legend="{array}"]
     td-unidad="{string}">
   ...
</div>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
tdDataarray

Data array used for populating the chart

tdXattributestring

Name of the attribute used organizing columns with different categories

tdIdAttributestring

Name of the attribute used for the ID of unique entities in teh data set

tdSizeAttributestring

Name of the attribute used for defining the size of the elements (i.e. number of students)

tdColorAttributestring

Name of the attribute used to define the color categories in the chart

tdTooltipMessage
(optional)
function

Function that should return a text to be displayed in the tooltip, given a data element

tdWidth
(optional)
int

Chart widht

tdHeight
(optional)
int

Chart height

tdColorLegend
(optional)
array

Array that returns the color codes used in the legend each element is an array ["category", "color"]

tdUnidadstring

Label with unit used for the size of the elements (Ex: "Students")
